info.title: Merged API Services
info.description: This is a merged OpenAPI specification containing multiple API services

get.summary: Retrieve the latest 24 hour weather forecast
get.description:
**[https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/twenty-four-hr-forecast](https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/twenty-four-hr-forecast)**
- Updated multiple times throughout the day
- Filter for specific date or date-time by providing `date` in query parameter. - use YYYY-MM-DD format to retrieve all of the readings for that day - use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss to retrieve the latest readings at that moment in time - example: `?date=2024-07-16` or `?date=2024-07-16T23:59:00`
- Possible values for forecast include: - Fair - Fair (Day) - Fair (Night) - Fair and Warm - Partly Cloudy - Partly Cloudy (Day) - Partly Cloudy (Night) - Cloudy - Hazy - Slightly Hazy - Windy - Mist - Fog - Light Rain - Moderate Rain - Heavy Rain - Passing Showers - Light Showers - Showers - Heavy Showers - Thundery Showers - Heavy Thundery Showers - Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: SGT date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). Example: 2024-07-16 or 2024-07-16T23:59:00

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent data pages

label_location.description: Provides longitude and latitude for placing readings on a map

updatedTimestamp.description: Time of acquisition of data from NEA

tiemstamp.description: Time forecast was issued by NEA

general.description: A general weather forecast for the 24 hour period

validPeriod.description: Period of time the forecast is valid for

enum: Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds

speed.description: Unit of measure - Kilometeres per hour

periods.description: Forecasts for various areas in Singapore

timePeriod.description: Period of time the forecast is valid for

enum: Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds
Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds
Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds
Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds
Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds

paginationToken.description: Token to retrieve next page if exists
paginationToken.example: b2Zmc2V0PTEwMA== (you will see this token only if next page exists)

enum: Invalid date format. Date format must be YYYY-MM-DD (2024-06-01) or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss (2024-06-01T08:30:00).

get.summary: Retrieve the latest two hour weather forecast
get.description:
**[https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/two-hr-forecast](https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/two-hr-forecast)**
- Updated half-hourly from NEA - Forecasts are given for multiple areas in Singapore
- Filter for specific date or date-time by providing `date` in query parameter. - use YYYY-MM-DD format to retrieve all of the readings for that day - use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss to retrieve the latest readings at that moment in time - example: `?date=2024-07-16` or `?date=2024-07-16T23:59:00`
- Possible values for forecast include: - Fair - Fair (Day) - Fair (Night) - Fair and Warm - Partly Cloudy - Partly Cloudy (Day) - Partly Cloudy (Night) - Cloudy - Hazy - Slightly Hazy - Windy - Mist - Fog - Light Rain - Moderate Rain - Heavy Rain - Passing Showers - Light Showers - Showers - Heavy Showers - Thundery Showers - Heavy Thundery Showers - Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds
- Area metadata - The `area_metadata` field in the response provides longitude/latitude information for the areas. You can use that to place the forecasts on a map.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: SGT date for which to retrieve data (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent data pages

label_location.description: Provides longitude and latitude for placing readings on a map

updated_timestamp.description: Time of acquisition of data from NEA

timestamp.description: Time forecast was issued by NEA

valid_period.description: Period of time the forecast is valid for

forecasts.description: Forecasts for various areas in Singapore

enum: Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds

paginationToken.description: Token to retrieve next page if exists
paginationToken.example: b2Zmc2V0PTEwMA== (you will see this token only if next page exists)

enum: Invalid date format. Date format must be YYYY-MM-DD (2024-06-01) or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss (2024-06-01T08:30:00).

get.summary: Retrieve the latest 4 day weather forecast
get.description:
**[https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/four-day-outlook](https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/four-day-outlook)**
- Updated twice a day from NEA - The forecast is for the next 4 days.
- Filter for specific date or date-time by providing `date` in query parameter. - use YYYY-MM-DD format to retrieve all of the readings for that day - use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss to retrieve the latest readings at that moment in time - example: `?date=2024-07-16` or `?date=2024-07-16T23:59:00`

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: SGT date for which to retrieve data (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent data pages

data.description: Chronologically ordered forecasts for the next 4 days

enum: Heavy Thundery Showers with Gusty Winds

speed.description: Unit of measure - Kilometeres per hour

enum: Invalid date format. Date format must be YYYY-MM-DD (2024-06-01) or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss (2024-06-01T08:30:00).

get.summary: Get air temperature readings across Singapore
get.description:
**[https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/air-temperature](https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/air-temperature)**
- Has per-minute readings from NEA
- Filter for specific date or date-time by providing `date` in query parameter. - use YYYY-MM-DD format to retrieve all of the readings for that day - use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss to retrieve the latest readings at that moment in time - example: `?date=2024-07-16` or `?date=2024-07-16T23:59:00` - Unit of measure for readings is `Â°C`

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS (SGT). Example: 2024-07-16 or 2024-07-16T23:59:00

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent data pages

deviceId.description: Reading Device's ID (usually same as Station's ID)

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the region label

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the region label

paginationToken.description: Token to retrieve next page if exists
paginationToken.example: b2Zmc2V0PTEwMA== (you will see this token only if next page exists)

enum: Invalid date format. Date format must be YYYY-MM-DD (2024-06-01) or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss (2024-06-01T08:30:00).

get.summary: Retrieve the latest WBGT data for accurate heat stress assessment
get.description:
**[https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/weather?api=wbgt](https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/weather?api=wbgt)**
- Updated multiple times throughout the day
- Filter for specific date or date-time by providing `date` in query parameter. - use YYYY-MM-DD format to retrieve all of the readings for that day - use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss to retrieve the latest readings at that moment in time - example: `?date=2025-01-16` or `?date=2025-01-16T23:59:00` - Unit of measure for readings is `Â°C`

parameters.name: api
parameters.description: Set the value to `wbgt` to fetch WBGT records

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: SGT date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). Example: 2025-01-16 or 2025-01-16T23:59:00

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent data pages

datetime.description: Time the observasation was issued by NEA

item.description: A weather observation for the WBGT

type.description: Type of the weather information (`observation` or `forecast`). WBGT is always `observation.

isStationData.description: Indicates whether the weather information includes station information.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the location, represented as a string.

longtitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the location, represented as a string.

datetime.description: The date and time when the weather reading was taken, formatted in ISO 8601.

text.description: A textual description of the weather event, which can include types such as "Cloud to Cloud" or "Cloud to Ground."

type.description: The type of lightning event, which can be either "C" for Cloud to Cloud or "G" for Cloud to Ground.

heatStress.description: A string indicating the level of heat stress at the location

wbgt.description: Wet Bulb Globe Temperature value at the station

updatedTimestamp.description: Time of acquisition of data from NEA

paginationToken.description: Token to retrieve next page if exists
paginationToken.example: b2Zmc2V0PTEwMA== (you will see this token only if next page exists)

enum: Invalid date format. Date format must be YYYY-MM-DD (2025-02-01) or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss (2025-02-01T08:30:00).

get.summary: Get wind direction readings across Singapore
get.description:
**[https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/wind-direction](https://api-open.data.gov.sg/v2/real-time/api/wind-direction)**
- Has per-minute readings from NEA
- Filter for specific date or date-time by providing `date` in query parameter. - use YYYY-MM-DD format to retrieve all of the readings for that day - use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss to retrieve the latest readings at that moment in time - example: `?date=2024-07-16` or `?date=2024-07-16T23:59:00` - Unit of measure for readings is `Â°`

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: SGT date for which to retrieve data (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent data pages

deviceId.description: Reading Device's ID (usually same as Station's ID)

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the region label

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the region label

paginationToken.description: Token to retrieve next page if exists
paginationToken.example: b2Zmc2V0PTEwMA== (you will see this token only if next page exists)

enum: Invalid date format. Date format must be YYYY-MM-DD (2024-06-01) or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss (2024-06-01T08:30:00).
